explanation.rules:
Rules:
• Basic order = S V (O) (L) (S = subject, V = predicate, O = object, L = place); 1 sg subject takes the prefix ŋg‑ before the verb.
• Reordering = X V L ≡ L V X (any XP may front before L).
• Possession = N P (noun precedes possessive pronoun).
• Gender / number concord prefixes: singular mú‑, dí‑, ʒí‑; plural à‑, má‑; place nouns mû‑. (Before a vowel i‑ → j‑, u‑ → w‑, a‑ → ∅.)
• Tone assimilation: the tone on the last syllable of a word copies the tone on the first syllable of the next word.
• Clause‑final tone: low in declaratives, high in interrogatives.
